name: Jill Valerie Boyd
what_you_do: As an image consultant, I begin working with clients from the inside out, seeing, hearing, and feeling their essence and then mirroring back to them their gifts so that they can start the journey of designing their Signature Style.
social_proof: Book- Ageless & Iconic Looking Fabulous At Any Age available on amazon.com
signature_programs: Finding Your Signature Style, Why Looking Successful is Important for Your Business, Skin care and Makeup, Interview Dressing, Become a Silver-Haired Beauty, Selecting Your Best Colors, How to Dress for Your Changing Body
business_focus: Providing image consulting, personal styling, and educational classes to help clients design their signature style.
